title: Major League Cricket 2025: Schedule, Teams, Venues & Where to Watch in India?
body:
The Major League Cricket T20 Competition is all set to move towards its third Edition. As fans eagerly await the Major League Cricket 2025 Schedule, it’s worth remembering that the inaugural season of the MLC competition took place in 2023. In the past seasons, youngsters and popular cricket players have showcased their talent.

In the latest season, cricket fans are expecting tough competition between participating teams. The much-awaited opening ceremony will take place on June 12, 2025. So, the tournament will kick off with the thrilling opening game on June 2, 2025.

Washington Freedom claimed their maiden Major League Cricket title in 2024. Travis Head, the aggressive T20 batter, was awarded the player of the tournament award for the MLC 2024. On the other hand, Cricketer Faf du Plessis was the leading scorer with 420 runs.

More Stuff

Major League Cricket 2025 Schedule, Time, and Fixtures

Participating teams’ details of the Major League Cricket 2025:

In the third season of Major League Cricket, six teams will take part and face each other in a round-robin stage. The two teams from the participants list will play the most thrilling and tough game, the final match. So, make sure you go through the complete list of the participating teams.

Major League Cricket 2025 Venue details:

The complete event of the Major League Cricket 2025 competition will take place across three different locations. Dallas, California, and Lauderhill in Florida are the three official venues for the Major League Cricket 2025 competition.

Where to watch the Live coverage and streaming of the Major League Cricket 2025:

In India, the Sony Sports Network is likely to provide live coverage of the Kartini Cup 2025. The network held the official rights to broadcast in the previous season, so it is likely to continue broadcasting the competition via Sony Sports Network.
summary:
**Tournament Details:**

* The Major League Cricket T20 Competition is set to enter its third edition.
* The inaugural season took place in 2023.
* The third season is scheduled to start with the opening ceremony on June 12, 2025, and the first match on June 13, 2025.

**Previous Season:**

* Washington Freedom won the maiden Major League Cricket title in 2024.
* Travis Head was awarded the player of the tournament award for MLC 2024.
* Faf du Plessis was the leading scorer with 420 runs in the previous season.

**Major League Cricket 2025:**

* Six teams will participate in the tournament, facing each other in a round-robin stage.
* The final match will feature the top two teams from the participants list.
* The tournament will take place across three different locations: Dallas, California, and Lauderhill in Florida.

**Broadcasting:**

* In India, the Sony Sports Network is likely to provide live coverage and streaming of the Major League Cricket 2025 competition, having held the official broadcasting rights in the previous season.
